scripts.build: coffee -o ./dist/module.js ./src; babel -o dist/index.js --presets @babel/preset-env --presets @babel/preset-stage-3 --plugins @babel/plugin-transform-runtime dist/module.js; sed -i "s/(0, _eyes.inspector)/_eyes.inspector/g" dist/index.js
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean; npm run build
